column2: I don't remember the last movie I saw in the theatre, and that makes me really sad
Ok ... the passengers ... no one is alive ... they're all dead ... you just don't know it til the end ... then you cry .
wow, there's still the void of whre thomas left  The heartache is never going to go away
wow.. tomorrow and then it's over. i'll never see some of those people again. it's kind of sad.
